        Sequence {

            "&[before 1]H<ģ<<<Ģ"
            "&[before 1]J<y<<<Y"
            "&[before 1]L<ķ<<<Ķ"
            "&[before 1]M<ļ<<<Ļ"
            "&[before 1]O<ņ<<<Ņ"
            "&[before 1]S<ŗ<<<Ŗ"
            "&[before 1]T<š<<<Š"
            "&[before 1]Ʒ<ž<<<Ž"
        }
      }
    }
}
